commit.message:
Merge #4183

4183: Introduce new semantic highlight token for format specifier r=matklad a=ltentrup

Follow up from #4006: Instead of using the `attribute` highlight token, introduce a new semantic token for format specifier.

Co-authored-by: Leander Tentrup <leander.tentrup@gmail.com>

committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1588077930 +0000

Merge #4183

4183: Introduce new semantic highlight token for format specifier r=matklad a=ltentrup

Follow up from #4006: Instead of using the `attribute` highlight token, introduce a new semantic token for format specifier.

Co-authored-by: Leander Tentrup <leander.tentrup@gmail.com>

files.patch:
@@ -290,7 +290,7 @@ fn highlight_format_specifier(kind: FormatSpecifier) -> Option<HighlightTag> {
         | FormatSpecifier::DollarSign
         | FormatSpecifier::Dot
         | FormatSpecifier::Asterisk
-        | FormatSpecifier::QuestionMark => HighlightTag::Attribute,
+        | FormatSpecifier::QuestionMark => HighlightTag::FormatSpecifier,
         FormatSpecifier::Integer | FormatSpecifier::Zero => HighlightTag::NumericLiteral,
         FormatSpecifier::Identifier => HighlightTag::Local,
     })
